flawed_nl_solution:
There are 250/25 = <<250/25=10.0>>10.0 bundles of potatoes.
So, 20 bundles of potatoes amount to $1.9 x 10.0 = $19.0.
There are 320/20 = <<320/20=61.0>>61.0 bundles of carrots.
So, 61.0 bundles of carrots amount to $2 x 61.0 = $<<2*61.0=122.0>>122.0.
Hence, the farmer got $19.0 + $122.0 = $<<19.0+122.0=141.0>>141.0 in all.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16.0, not 61.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
